biotools.summary: Anduin is a freely available research tool to segment vertebrae in a CT scan, uploaded as NIFTI data. It allows to calculate trabecular vBMD, download the segmentation as NIFTI, and vertebral centroid coordinates as JSON files.

bioschemas.name: anduin
bioschemas.summary: Anduin is a freely available research tool to segment vertebrae in a CT scan, uploaded as NIFTI data. It allows to calculate trabecular vBMD, download the segmentation as NIFTI, and vertebral centroid coordinates as JSON files.
